token-lean.Limit.Name: Maximum lean distance
token-lean.Limit.Hint: How many squares a token can lean. Works best between 0 and 1. Default = 0.25 (1/4 into the next square).
token-lean.leanWhilePaused.Name: Allow leaning while paused
token-lean.leanWhilePaused.Hint: When enabled, characters can lean while the game is paused.
token-lean.canLeanInCombat.Name: Allow leaning in combat
token-lean.canLeanInCombat.Hint: When enabled, characters can lean during combat encounters. (This can be toggled by the scene control.)
token-lean.combatLeanToggle.Name: Add combat lean toggle to scene controls
token-lean.combatLeanToggle.Hint: Add a button to the scene controls to toggle leaning in combat.
token-lean.notifyOnLean.Name: Notify when leaning
token-lean.notifyOnLean.Hint: Send a whisper to the GM when a character leans.
token-lean.notifyOncePerTurn.Name: Notify once per turn
token-lean.notifyOncePerTurn.Hint: When enabled, limit notifications to once per turn for each character.
token-lean.notifySound.Name: Notification sound
token-lean.notifySound.Hint: Sound played when a character leans.
token-lean.playSound.Name: Play sound with notification
token-lean.playSound.Hint: Play a sound when a character leans.
token-lean.notifyInCombatOnly.Name: Only notify in combat
